contents.text: Welcome to Zazzle, Peninsula’s premier online marketplace to shop or customize your favorite products.
For order support and account inquiries, press 1.
For updates on your order status and shipment tracking, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an order tracking specialist.

navigationGoals: Check the current delivery status and expected arrival date for my recent order.
Check the delivery status of my custom unit patch order.
I want to retrieve the live shipment tracking data and carrier details for my recent Zazzle order.
I need help checking the delivery date for the personalized photo calendar I ordered.
I’d like to track my order for the custom periodic table poster I purchased.

contents.text: For returns, exchanges, and refund questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a returns and refunds specialist.

navigationGoals: Start a return and get a refund for a defective item I received.
Start a return and refund for the commemorative dog tags I received with errors.
I need to initiate a return for a defective print and process a refund for my purchase.
I’d like to return a personalized mug that arrived chipped and get a refund.
I need to exchange a custom-printed physics department hoodie because the size is incorrect.

contents.text: For help designing products, customizing templates, or artwork support, press 2.
For assistance with our online design tools, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a design tools specialist.

navigationGoals: Get step-by-step help using the online design tool to add my logo to a product.
Get assistance using the web design tool to create a veteran reunion T-shirt.
I want step-by-step assistance using Zazzle’s online design editor to modify vector layers and typography.
I need step-by-step help using the online tool to design a custom birthday card.
I need help using the online design tool to create a lab report cover template.

contents.text: For uploading artwork files and format guidelines, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a file preparation specialist.

navigationGoals: Find out how to format and upload my artwork file to meet Zazzle’s requirements.
Ask about file format requirements to upload my unit insignia for engraving.
I need technical guidelines on uploading my artwork files—specifically file formats, DPI settings, bleed margins, and color profiles.
I want to know how to upload my own image for a canvas print and ensure it meets the file requirements.
I want to know the file requirements for uploading my vector diagram for a class poster.
